h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: It can also generate electrical power in its front leg, and stomp down to create a ring that extends outward, requiring you to dodge over it or use the Pillar Stance to evade it entirely.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
It can also generate electrical power in its front leg, and stomp down to create a ring that extends outward, requiring you to dodge over it or use the Pillar Stance to evade it entirely.
